property.name: Rules
property.value: Make a run on Archives. If successful, instead of accessing cards, add Political Graffiti to an agenda in the Corp's score area as a hosted condition counter with the text "This agenda is worth -1 agenda points. Trash Political Graffiti if the Corp purges virus counters."

property.name: Subtitle
property.value: Information Broker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Once per turn, you may jack out when you encounter a sentry.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Credits spend anywhere in the worlds, but there are other forms of currency."

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1[Memory Unit] +1[Link] Whenever you jack out, the Corp reveals 1 card from HQ at random. Limit 1 console per player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'm on a need-to-know basis. I need to know everything." -Nero Severn

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click]: Look at the top X cards of your stack and arrange them in any order. X is the number of copies of Spy Camera installed. [Trash]: Look at the top card of R&D. Limit 6 per deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Install only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. [Trash], pay the trash cost of a rezzed card: Trash that card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Leverage, secrets, access, and influence are currency as valuable as credits. But credits work, too.

property.name: Rules
property.value: 1[Credits]: Break ice subroutine on a piece of ice with 3 or more subtypes. 1[Credits]: +1 strength. 2[Credits]: Swap Sadyojata with a deva program from your grip.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Creator.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. When you steal an agenda, add "Freedom Through Equality" to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player has 1 additional [Click] to spend during his or her turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our shared humanity is our greatest strength. And as we share more broadly, our strength grows, not dwindles."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever the Corp rezzes an asset or upgrade, you may pay credits equal to its rez cost and trash Councilman. If you do, derez that asset or upgrade. The Corp cannot rez it for the remainder of this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bureaucracy and red tape have been weaponized." -Fake-ir

property.name: Rules
property.value: Place 3 agenda counters on Voting Machine Initiative when you score it. When the Runner's turn begins, you may spend 1 hosted agenda counter. If you do, the Runner loses [Click], if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, you may add 1 operation from Archives to HQ if there is no ice protecting this server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our research says the public views clones as more human than bioroids. Historically, this has been a liability. Let's make it a strength."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, do 1 net damage if there is no ice protecting this server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no conflict of interest here. These are complex issues with highly technical minutiae. It's only natural that the experts should lay down the guidelines."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you draw an agenda, you may reveal and install it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Politics is a dirty business. But so is business." -Krishnan Sareen

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When you score an agenda, add "Clones are not People" to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, you may draw 3 cards if there is no ice protecting this server. If you do, add 1 card from HQ to the bottom of R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Being a Mumbad sensie star means a glamorous life, though it is lived in constant fear of blackmail-or worse-from orgcrime.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your turn begins, gain 3[Credits] if there is no ice protecting this server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Money is speech and I am listening intently." -Krishnan Sareen

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Click]: Search R&D for an alliance card, reveal it, and play or install it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mumbad's public city corporation is tightly connected to all the other corporations.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine on Bailiff, gain 1[Credits]. [Subroutine] End the run.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Efficiency means profiting from things everyone was doing anyway.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you rez a card in or protecting this server (not including Surat City Grid), you may rez another card, lowering the rez cost by 2. Limit 1 region per server.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The political centre of Mumbad.

property.name: Faction
property.value: The Weyland Consortium
